f/o sew shut copyright © 2023 icrochetthings 4/4 assembly use green yarn to embroider a horizontal line between rounds and 34 35 use green yarn to embroider vertical lines over rounds to 30 32 use white yarn to embroider row of horizontal lines onto the bottle between rounds 3 and and and and 9 10 11 12 19 20 use white yarn to embroider a circle in the space between the horizontal lines use white yarn to embroider two eyes and a mouth inside the circle copyright © 2023 icrochetthings
